properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 8:24PM CST until January 18 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in
Illinois...

Illinois River at Ottawa affecting La Salle County

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois and Indiana...

Illinois River at La Salle affecting Bureau...La Salle and Putnam
Counties
Iroquois River at Rensselaer affecting Jasper County
Iroquois River near Foresman affecting Newton County
Iroquois River at Iroquois affecting Iroquois County
Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge affecting Porter County
Kankakee River near Kouts affecting Jasper and Porter Counties
Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake and Newton Counties

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 48 hours into the future.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Kankakee River at Dunns Bridge, or from US-421 south of La
Crosse downstream to IN-49 south of Kouts.
* from late Wednesday night to Saturday evening.
* At  800 PM Monday the stage was 9.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 10.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Thursday morning and
continue to rise to near 10.3 feet by early Friday morning.
* Impact...At 10.0 feet...Flooding begins of low lying agricultural
areas near the river.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.
